ssa-disability-insurance-child.title: Social Security Disability Insurance for Child
ssa-disability-insurance-child.headline: Social Security Disability Insurance for Child
ssa-disability-insurance-child.summary: Social Security Disability Insurance provides financial assistance to minor children whose parents receive disability benefits. Complete just one application to be considered for all benefits administered by the Social Security Administration.
ssa-disability-insurance-child.criticalA: A single SSA benefit application will be used to apply to all SSA benefits, but eligibility and approval will be determined for individual benefits.
ssa-disability-insurance-child.eligibili: You are under 18 years old (under 19 years old if you are a full-time student in an elementary or secondary school).
